item.title: Smart Face Filter - Real-time Selfie camera
item.description: Make ordinary photos look fantastic with 100+ animated filter effects. Whether you're on your own, with a friend, or with however many people there are, WowCam (AR Beauty Face filter) will preserve and add magic to your wonderful moments. *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}â–¶" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;" allowfullscreen title="Smart Face Filter - Real-time Selfie camera"
